name: PD
description:
[A playable Demo showing Unity's HD render pipeline. ]

Inspired by PT the Playable Teaser, this is my personal take on the horror walking simulator. This is a project that is suppose to demonstrate HD post processing and working with volumetric lights and shadows. It is a small project that was completed within 4 days and is an tech demo with a few stages.
===========================================================

Walk around an enclosed area and explore the story that of what happen to an unfortunate accident.
